text: Aur yaad karo woh waqt jabke (aey Nabi),khuda unko tumhare khwab mein thoda dikha raha tha. Agar kahin woh tumhein unki tadaad zyada dikha deta to zaroor tumlog himmat haar jatey aur ladayi ke maamle mein jhagda shuru kardete. Lekin Allah hi ne issey tumhein bachaya. Yakeenan woh seeno ka haal tak jaanta hai
